Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Moreover , further ARSA alleles functionally similar to A464V might exist which , together with 0 - type mutations , may cause pathological ARSA and GS levels , but not clinical outbreak of the disease . .

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Disease":

1. ARSA (Acetylcholine Receptor, Nicotinic, Alpha 4 Subunit) - This is the disease-causing gene mentioned in the paragraph.
2. GS (Ganglioside) - The paragraph mentions that pathological ARSA and GS levels may cause the disease.

So, the two disease entities mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. ARSA
2. Disease (a general term that refers to any abnormal condition of the body or mind)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph:

1. Disease - This is the main entity mentioned in the paragraph, as it refers to the abnormal condition of the body or mind that may be caused by pathological ARSA and GS levels.

So, the only relevant entity in the paragraph is:

1. Disease

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| ARSA |
| GS |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
